word: Use your ability to accomplish decided movements of reform in the churches. Gather about you those who are true as steel to the principles of the third angel's message, and the Lord will be glorified in the work that is accomplished. Let every worker resolve that he will not fail nor be discouraged.--Letter 66, 1911, pp. 3, 4. (To S. N. Haskell and wife, August 28, 1911.)
